The British public are calling for a limit on Islam for the following reasons:

Halal meat being sold and being sold without being labelled as such

Illegal Shariah law enforcement gangs patrolling certain areas causing fear and unrest due to threats of violence

Disrespectful marches against the country's police, soldiers, legal system & culture

Underground Jihad meetings & Shariah law campaigners

Causing divisions in society due to wearing the burka/ veil, forming their own societies and forming illegal Muslim courts

No respect/interest towards the British culture

Government to look deep into how Islam is affecting this country and must look into restricting the spread of the religion and its beliefs to prevent further damage to the the British way of life and further division in society by minimising the rate of spread of the religion, the sale of Halal, Islamic hate marches and protection of our own culture ie Christmas & Easter due to the threat of Islam.
